text: Terrence Hardiman (6 April 1937 - 8 May 2023) was an English actor. He was best known for playing The Demon Headmaster and also for his role as Luftwaffe Police Major Reinhardt in the 1970s drama series Secret Army. He also starred in the movie Gandhi. Hardiman was born in Forest Gate, Essex.
